name: Elbatsnu's Brewery
description:
Summary

You are Elbatsnu, an abandoned alchemist who was attending an apprenticeship. Because of horrible performance, Elbatsnu was kicked out of the Alchemists Circle and now has to prove on their own.

Control

You have a cauldron. The cauldron has an instability level. Every level has their own deck and shop. Draw cards, play them, gain money, spend money in the shop to extend your deck. Complete the quests. Repeat.

Team

dev693 - Developer

jonas2727 - Developer

ThePeat/Feraligatr - Developer

Yuof - Lead Developer

manio -  Composer, Interpret, Artist, Musician, Keyboard, Singer

Honorable mentions go out to all playtesters. Thank you ❤️
